blog.name: amusedyan
blog.title: MusingYan
blog.description: A blog for my yandere content: Requests are Open

summary: Idk if the ask box is open or not but can we continue this        Katsuki trying to convince his obsession that he bullied in...
question: Idk if the ask box is open or not but can we continue this        Katsuki trying to convince his obsession that he bullied in middle school how much he’s changed? Though it’s going to be hard cuz 1: they don’t go to UA so they cant tell if he’s trying to be nice or if it’s a cruel joke 2: they don’t allow Bakugo anywhere near them at all (if they spot him close they’ll run for it)    Please and Thank you. If not ignore my stupid ass. Love your writing keep it up. Have a nice day! 🖤❤🧡💛💚💙💜🖤
answer:
I’ll be honest I’m not really feeling a second part to that work, but I can give you a prequel!

Specifically one based around bb!Bakugou.

Thanks for the prompt!

Katsuki hated a lot of things.

He hated naptime, and stupid Deku, and the dumb art teacher. But most of all, he hated you.

He hated how when he looked at you he wanted to hold your hand, or how he wanted to show you his quirk to make you smile like you smiled at stupid Deku that one time when you colored with him.

It wasn’t fair that you played with Deku and not him! And he hated that he couldn’t have you to play with as much as he hated wanting to play with you in the first place.

He scowled as he stared at the fluffy green head of that quirkless loser who thought he could play with you.

His palms tingled with sweat, and he flexed them before they could spark.

He’d teach Deku a lesson, and then maybe you’d realize that Deku wasn’t fun to play with anymore, not like Katsuki was.

tags: cough cough pre character development bakugo cough cough
summary: Now that season 4 is coming out soon, it’s time to once again tell the anime onlys and triggered manga readers what we Overhaul...
body: Now that season 4 is coming out soon, it’s time to once again tell the anime onlys and triggered manga readers what we Overhaul stans have been trying to say. LIKING A CHARACTER DOES NOT MEAN YOU CONDONE THEIR ACTIONS. I’m tired of seeing fans hate on people who like Overhaul because of what he does. Some of which are the same people who stan the LOV, who actively try to murder children. News flash people, you can like a character, and not like the things they do. Also friendly reminder that this is a manga/show. Not real life. So calm your tits please.
